title: HeightMapFilterParameters
Outlier cell height reset epsilon: If a single cell is higher than all its neighbors by this amount, that cell is labeled an outlier and removed.
Min neighbors to determine outliers: The number of occupied neighbor cells to allow determining if a cell is an outlier.
Min neighbors at same height for valid: Min neighboring cells at the same height to determine that a cell is not an outlier.
Hole proximity threshold: Number of cells in a direction to search for data to fill in holes.
